News.Title: Aditya Ultra Steel: SME Stock Surges 8% Amid Market Downturn
News.Summary: Aditya Ultra Steel Limited's stock rose 8% intraday, contrasting with broader market declines. The company reported strong H1FY25 results with revenue of ₹312.39 crore, EBITDA of ₹10.50 crore, and net profit of ₹5.20 crore. The firm announced plans for capacity expansion and a 5,000 KWP solar power plant investment of ₹15.35 crore.

News.Title: Aditya Ultra Steel: Rs 5.87 Crore Profit, New 5 MW Solar Plant Announced
News.Summary: Aditya Ultra Steel reported a net profit of Rs 5.87 crore for H1 FY2024-25. Revenue from operations was Rs 312.39 crore. The company announced plans to set up a 5 MW solar power plant in Rajkot, Gujarat, with an investment of Rs 15 crore.
